'''12w03a''' is the first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.2.1]], released on January 19, 2012,<ref>{{cite|url=http://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2012/01/minecraft-snapshot-12w03a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 12w03a|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=January 19, 2012}}</ref> which added [[jungle]] biomes and jungle trees.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Jungle Leaves JE1 BE2.png|32px]] [[Jungle Leaves]]'''
* Generates as part of jungle trees.
* Drops oak saplings.

'''[[File:Jungle Log (UD) JE1.png|32px]] [[Jungle Log]]'''
* Slightly-mossy brown textured with horizontal bark.
* Generates as part of jungle trees.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Biome]]s'''
* Added [[jungle biome]].
* Thick canopy with jungle trees, vines, fern, and brightly-colored grass.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Ladder (S) JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Ladder]]s'''
* Regained collision box.

'''[[File:Vines (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[Vine]]s'''
* Are now climbable if the player was pushed into a solid block while next to them.

=== Items ===
[[File:Spawn Egg.png|32x32px]] '''[[Spawn Egg]]s'''
* [[Dispenser]]s can spawn mobs when dispensing spawn eggs.
* Spawn eggs are now stackable to 64.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Wolf JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wolves]]'''
* Have new AI.
* Can be bred by using [[raw chicken]], [[cooked chicken]], [[raw porkchop]], [[cooked porkchop]], [[raw beef]], [[steak]], and [[rotten flesh]] when tamed.

'''[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie]]s'''
* Have new path-finding AI.

=== Gameplay ===
'''Fog'''
* The [[Nether fog]] now appears closer to the player. 

=== General ===
'''[[Language]]s'''
* Updated language files.</onlyinclude>
